output_list.description: mintToken function allows arbitrary increase of token supply, aka 'The mintToken() Integer Overflow' issue.
sell function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount * sellPrice' in 'msg.sender.transfer()' call, aka 'The sell() Integer Overflow' issue.
buy function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount' in 'balanceOf[this] -= amount' call, aka 'The buy() Integer Overflow' issue.
transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control, aka 'The transferFrom() Access Control' issue.
mintToken function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control, aka 'The mintToken() Access Control' issue.
